name: Muhammed Hanas V.H.
about: Data-driven AI & Machine Learning Engineer pursuing a Master's in Artificial Intelligence at Johannes Kepler University Linz. Experienced in data analysis, fault prediction, and machine-learning experimentation using Python, PySpark and SQL. Adept at building reliable, well-documented models and analytics pipelines for industrial and automotive environments. Strong coding discipline, analytical mindset, and passion for transforming complex datasets into actionable insights that enhance quality and performance.
